title: Reynolds American (RAI) Showing Bullish Technicals
content:
After Tuesday’s trading in Reynolds American Inc (RAI) MarketIntelligenceCenter.com's patented algorithms uncovered a trade that offers a 2.74% return or 13.89% on an annualized basis (for comparison purposes only), while providing 5.42% downside protection.

The trade is a Nov. '15 covered call at the $41.25 level for a net debit of about $40.15. The net debit is also the breakeven point for this trade.

For a higher return, consider buying a longer-term call option, like the Jan. '17 at the $20.00 level. By buying the call for $22.45 instead of paying about $42.45 for the stock, the assigned return rate for this alternate trade is 5.46%, but the stock has to finish above $40.15 when the sold call expires for this trade to be profitable.

Standard & Poor’s has a 5 STARS (out of 5) strong buy ranking on Reynolds American. Technical indicators for the stock have been bullish and support and resistance have been in the area of $41.61 and $42.99, respectively.
